prompt: Chaza ngokubaluleka kwesiko lwelobola eNingizimu Afrika
text: Ilobolo liyisiko elibalulekile eliqinisekisa ukuhlonishwa komndeni wentombi nokwakhiwa kobudlelwano phakathi kwemindeni yomshado.
Ezinye izizwe zaseNingizimu Afrika zibheka ilobolo njengendlela yokuhlonipha intombi nomndeni wayo, kwandise inhlonipho phakathi kwezihlobo.
Ngaphandle kwelobolo, umshado awubhekwa njengogcwele noma osemthethweni, ngakho-ke ubalulekile ekuhlanganiseni imindeni.
label: machine

prompt: Bhala inkulumo emfushane phakathi kwabangani ababili eGoli
text:
Sipho: Sawubona Thabo, kudala singabonani! 
Thabo: Yebo mfowethu! Kunjani? 
Sipho: Ngikhona, umsebenzi eGoli ungithwalisa kanzima kodwa kuyahamba.

Nomsa: Sanibonani Bongi, uhlalaphi manje? 
Bongi: Ngihlala eHillbrow, wena? 
Nomsa: NgingaseSandton, ake sithintane siphume ngeweekend.

Sizwe: Hawu Mfundo, usafunda eWits? 
Mfundo: Yebo, ngisenza unyaka wokugcina. 
Sizwe: Hamba kahle mfowethu, ngiyajabula ngawe.
label: machine

text: AmaZulu aqala ukukhula njengohlanga olukhulu ngesikhathi sobukhosi bukaShaka Zulu, owahlanganisa izizwe eziningi.
Ngaphansi kukaShaka, amaZulu aba umbuso onamandla, enza izinguquko kwezamasosha nezokuphatha.
Ngemva kokufa kukaShaka, ubukhosi baqhubeka buholwa nguDingane, kwalandela uMpande noCetshwayo ngesikhathi sempi yaseIsandlwana.
label: machine

prompt: Chaza ngamasiko amasha eZulu eskhathini samanje
text: Ezulwini lanamuhla, amaZulu asebenzisa izindlela zesimanje ezifana nomshado wasemahhovisi kodwa esagcina amasiko endabuko.
Amasiko amasha afaka ukusebenzisa imithombo yezokuxhumana ukukhuthaza izigigaba zomndeni nezamasiko.
Noma abantu abaningi sebefudukela emadolobheni, bayagcina amasiko ngokwenza imicimbi njengememulo nasemshadweni.
label: machine

text: Kudala-dala, kwakukhona uNogwaja okhanyayo noFudu onesineke. Bagijima emjahweni, uNogwaja waphumula phakathi nomgwaqo kwathi uFudu wahamba kancane waze wawina.
UNogwaja wayeziqhenya ngobushesha bakhe, kepha uFudu wamnqoba emjahweni ngenxa yokubekezela nokungaphephi. Le nganekwane ifundisa isifundo sokungazigqaji.
Ngemva komjaho, uNogwaja wafunda ukuthi ukuziqhenya akukwenzi uwine, kanti uFudu wabonisa ukuthi ukubekezela kubalulekile empilweni.
label: machine
